entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
